description:
The first DLC of Season 2 expands your garage with a unique car chase pack!

Bullet: This classic American muscle car oozes pure power and strength - the perfect getaway car!

Razor: One of the finest tuner cars, very agile and super fast on twisty tracks.

Cardinal: This former law enforcement vehicle with its reinforced body is ideal for the toughest car chases!

This DLC pack is included in Season Pass 2.
name: Getaway Car Pack
